thread.section_title: Smooth Hotel Rome Termini - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice overnight stay
thread.title_full: Nice overnight stay - Review of Smooth Hotel Rome Termini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: iloveiraglass
title: Nice overnight stay
text:
We stayed at Smooth as a stop over in Rome between a trip to Florence and our return home. Its location near Termini was perfect for that purpose!
The rooms are small, but perfectly clean and modern. The wifi is good and the bed is comfortable.
As other reviewers have noted, the staff is very professional. David helped us with check-in, taxi reservation for the next day, loaning us an additional electrical adapter, and pointing us in the direction of a simple restaurant for dinner.
I certainly would recommend it :)
